ModuleDescription: A dissertation on an approved research topic not exceeding twelve thousand words.
Prerequisite:
Cohort 2015 and before:
Completed 110 MCs including 60 MCs of PH major requirements with a minimum CAP of 3.50. Cohort 2016 onwards:
Completed 110 MCs including 44 MCs of PH major requirements with a minimum CAP of 3.50.
